law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Crime" means conduct that is a crime under the law of this State or federal law.

section.section: "Disposition" means the sentencing or determination of penalty or punishment to be imposed on a person convicted of a crime or against whom a finding of sufficient facts for conviction is made.
"Disposition" includes dismissal of charges or other disposition under a plea bargain agreement.

text.section: "Restitution" means money or services that a defendant is ordered to pay or render to a victim, victim's representative, or other person or governmental unit.
"Victim" means a person who suffers direct or threatened physical, emotional, or financial harm as a result of a crime.

"Victim's representative" includes:
a spouse, child, sibling, or a parent of a victim who is a minor, incompetent, or a victim of a homicide; or
a guardian of a minor or an incompetent.
"Witness" means a person who is or expects to be a State's witness.
